Articles.Content:
This is due to us looking for more people. I plan to start in around a week. These things don't start instantly

I never joined because of the lengthy mod list. Wait... is it just KMP now.

I never joined because of the lengthy mod list. Wait... is it just KMP now.

There have never been any other mods

I think we should post our perspectives on our respective channels. Also what do you want people to call you in chat, commentary, etc?

(You can call me "Ninja" or "Guy")

Hmmm...... SInce I will be calling my corp phenox corp, I am thinking phenox, but I am bad with names, so let me know if you come up with a better one.

Also have you seen Delfiler recently? I haven't heard from him in awhile. Do you have any contact info for him? I will try to reach him on youtube.

I never joined because of the lengthy mod list. Wait... is it just KMP now.

I have stated in the past that you can use other small mods to help you like improved docking, but that is the only required mod.

What time zone are you in?

Hmmm...... SInce I will be calling my corp phenox corp, I am thinking phenox, but I am bad with names, so let me know if you come up with a better one.

Also have you seen Delfiler recently? I haven't heard from him in awhile. Do you have any contact info for him? I will try to reach him on youtube.

Haven't heard from him

I think we should post our perspectives on our respective channels.

I think we will let the rest of the members vote before we start this. The big idea is at least putting battles and collaboration stuff of all of it edited together, but I would understand the no. That or maybe at least a news network type of thing where there are short, brief, recaps about what basically happened during the turn with little to no details.

I think we will let the rest of the members vote before we start this. The big idea is at least putting battles and collaboration stuff of all of it edited together, but I would understand the no. That or maybe at least a news network type of thing where there are short, brief, recaps about what basically happened during the turn with little to no details.

That's probably a good idea

That's probably a good idea

It should be good for getting people interest and helping people getting interested in each others channels.

It should be good for getting people interest and helping people getting interested in each others channels.

Oh yeah defiantly
No one has talked about my new pricing system idea yet. Also people that are interested in joining. Please tell me your timezone. We will be using multiplayer.

No one has talked about my new pricing system idea yet. Also people that are interested in joining. Please tell me your timezone. We will be using multiplayer.

I dont understand it to be honest

read the last post on 9.

2 things.

A) How should we handle videos? All on one channel together, or on serrate channels? (channel name will be Kerbal Corp Wars)

I don't have a good username for this. Any ideas?

The idea is if A is accepted, then we upload all of the views on one channel and do a turn video of all of the big points put together in one video. Then we can upload separate videos on our own channels on small details. Also make battles there own videos.

Also I was thinking I would be "Gamemaster". Any objections?

Finally a new idea of the building system. How about we do a thing where we have a base price for the size and then add price based on the shots. Like 1 for small shots that can be loaded normally and 2 for medium and 3 for large.

Any thoughts?

Also I was thinking we would do a test game once ready. We would upload these videos and use these to make changes and balance.

What do you think?

General jist:

1) Fighter only small missles (can dock with carrier)

2) Satellite defences. Any missles

3) Frigate medium and small (can only dock with a super carrier) (about the size of the things ramming macy's fighters in the final fight)

4) Cruiser medium and small (Is to big to dock with a super carrier) (about the size of the ship with like 50 missles)

5) battleship small to large (The armored thing that macy built that destroyed a carrier)

6) carrier none (size of macy's)

7) supercarrier small

8) any sort of ground defense used to launch ships.

This is the message I was talking about.
Oh yeah that. I had no problem with it.

I was thinking:

1) small missle .5 (you can spend half a build point)

2) medium 1 (as in a smart missle

3) Large 2 (as in a small booster)

might want to change the large to a 1.5. Also the price of all ships will drop to accommodate this.

Last but not least, let me know if you want me to post example pictures of the missiles.

Hey guys this idea has a lot of potential and i would love to be a part of this. I was thinking if possible i might be able to fill the pacifist roll, if of course someone else hasn't taken it. I don't really have the software or the equipment to record any game play, would it be possible for me to join without contributing to the YouTube channel? I also can only play on the weekends and friday, this as well as the fact that i live in EST may pose some scheduling issues. Let me know what you think. As a side note have you considered using dark multi instead of KMP?

Cheers!

Hey guys this idea has a lot of potential and i would love to be a part of this. I was thinking if possible i might be able to fill the pacifist roll, if of course someone else hasn't taken it. I also can only play on the weekends and friday, this as well as the fact that i live in EST may pose some scheduling issues. Let me know what you think. As a side note have you considered using dark multi instead of KMP?

Cheers!

So what time zone are you in? I have no problem with someone who just acts as another corp. Also you don't have to fit into that exact role. We do allow you to shape your corp more, that is just more of a idea of what kind of personalities we would like.

Also I was saying kerbal multiplayer mod in general. I was thinking about using dar multiplayer from the beginning, though I want to check some other sources.
alright sounds good, i just wanted to make sure you knew that it was out there
